title: The Pleasure of Two
description: Francesca is a thirty-two year old woman who isnâ€™t ready to settle down yet. She uses the Internet to meet others online for sex to fulfill her desires as well as those of others. Fran meets Pierre a businessmen from New York When they agree to meet in person and leave the Internet games behind, will Pierre give Fran what she wants? Does Pierre have something in store that Fran doesn't expect? Join Fran at the start of the Digital Desires series.
